hero.title: We do the work of the country in the country, building a self-reliant nation.

services.title: You need it, we've got it

expertFreelancers.title: Connect to Expert Freelancers
expertFreelancers.description: Find the perfect match for your project from our talented pool of professionals

securePayments.title: Secure Payments
securePayments.description: Payment protection and convenient payment methods for peace of mind

qualityWork.title: Quality Work
qualityWork.description: Get high-quality deliverables that meet your business standards

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Round-the-clock assistance to help you with any questions

unique.question: What makes FreelanceBD unique?
unique.answer: FreelanceBD offers a diverse pool of talented freelancers, secure payment systems, and quality assurance for all projects.

payments.question: How do payments work?
payments.answer: We offer secure payment methods with escrow protection to ensure both parties are satisfied with the transaction.

jobs.question: How do I find the right freelancer?
jobs.answer: You can browse portfolios, reviews, and ratings to find the perfect match for your project needs.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Yes, we implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal and business information.

documents.question: What documents do I need to start?
documents.answer: You only need a valid email address and payment method to get started with FreelanceBD.

create.title: Create a new Gig
create.subtitle: Enter the details to create the gig
create.titlePlaceholder: e.g. I will do something I'm really good at

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At FreelanceBD, our mission is to empower talented individuals and businesses in Bangladesh to connect, collaborate, and thrive in the digital economy. We strive to create opportunities that enable economic growth and professional development while fostering a community built on trust, quality, and innovation.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision FreelanceBD as the premier platform that transforms the freelancing landscape in Bangladesh, making it easier for skilled professionals to showcase their talents globally while helping businesses find the perfect match for their projects. Our goal is to be the catalyst for digital entrepreneurship and economic empowerment in Bangladesh.

value1.title: Quality & Excellence
value1.description: We are committed to maintaining the highest standards of quality in every interaction and transaction on our platform.

value2.title: Trust & Transparency
value2.description: We build trust through transparent practices, secure payments, and honest communication between all parties.

value3.title: Innovation & Growth
value3.description: We continuously innovate and adapt to provide the best tools and opportunities for our community's growth and success.

profile.completeProfile: Please complete your profile to get started
